TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XText extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 項目可以包含文字內容。XML elements can contain text content. 有時內容是簡單 （項目只包含文字內容），以及有時混合內容 （項目的內容會包含文字和其他項目）。Sometimes the content is simple (the element only contains text content), and sometimes the content is mixed (the contents of the element contains both text and other elements). 在任一情況下，每個區塊的文字會表示為節點。In either case, each chunk of text is represented as an node. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 開發人員通常需要撰寫程式碼來處理任意[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]自己所建立的樹狀結構。 developers will often have to write code to work with arbitrary [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that they did not create. 如果您要撰寫程式碼，必須使用[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]無權控制建立的樹狀結構，您應該注意的特定行為節點。If you are writing code that has to work with [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that you have no control over creating, you should be aware of certain behaviors of nodes. 在處理 XML 樹狀結構節點層級的內容時，您應該準備多個彼此相鄰的節點。When processing the contents of an XML tree at the node level, you should be prepared for multiple nodes to be adjacent to each other. 此外，您應該準備不包含任何文字節點。Further, you should be prepared for nodes that contain no text. 您可透過[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]方法來移除文字節點的內容。It is possible through [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] methods to remove the content of a text node. 不過，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]並不會自動刪除節點。However, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] does not automatically delete the node. 節點上有身分識別，且可能會有註解，因此[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]允許長度為零的節點在樹狀目錄中。The node has identity, and might have annotations, so [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] allows for zero-length nodes in the tree. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 搭配節點進行程式設計](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f)。For more information, see [Programming with Nodes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會建立文字節點使用建構函式。You typically do not create text nodes by using the constructors. 當您傳遞文字內容建構時，文字節點會自動建立。When you pass text content when constructing an , text nodes are automatically created. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含一個文字節點的項目。The following example creates an element that contains a text node. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Some text ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式主要在內部用來建立 XML 樹狀結構的深層複本。This constructor is primarily used internally to make a deep copy of an XML tree.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of this node.
A that contains the value of this node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性將會引發而事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下列範例顯示取得和設定這個屬性。The following example shows getting and setting this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); XText txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); txtNode.Value = "New text"; Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); root.Value = "Newer text"; txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Dim txtNode As XText = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) txtNode.Value = "New text" Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) root.Value = "Newer text" txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text New text Newer text ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要是在內部由寫入至 XML 樹狀結構的方法。This method is primarily used internally by the methods that write an XML tree to an .
